bug.author: chicm-ms
bug.description:
tensorflow.examples.tutorials is not found on some distribution of tensorflow, such as tensorflow-gpu 1.15 on windows. the package is available in tensorflow-gpu 1.15 on linux. Got following error on mnist-tfv1 with tensorflow_gpu-1.15.2-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl: <denchmark-code>Traceback (most recent call last):
File "mnist.py", line 10, in <module>
from tensorflow.examples.tutorials.mnist import input_data
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'tensorflow.examples.tutorials' </denchmark-code>
